Name: Drift Alone
About the game: Feel the motion, smell the smoke in this full speed drift racing indie game. The game focuses on simple controls and fun simcade style car physics. This is pretty much a skill game. Throw your car trough corners and get the best driftpoints to beat the game. Have fun and keep your car on the road!! Warning! Don't break your controllers. Tested to work with any kind of keyboard&mouse setups or with Xbox One controller or similar (like Sony DualsShock 3 etc). Doom's Day update December 26 2021 - Added more smoke, more fire, more AI cars on track - AI has now weapons (weapons can be disabled in arcade) - Improved story mod and city scene - Added more visuals (can be disabled in settings) - Cars has now customizable setups (colors, chassis, tires, turbo pressure, etc.) update December 22 2020 Added traffic, new AI, local multiplayer splitscreen support, day/night switch in 3lap races. new touge tracks: Akina and Harugahara This game includes 5 game modes. - Drifting (alone or against AI, depends on difficulty) - Free roam - Championships - Drive Replay (You chase your earlier self on a racetrack or touge.) - Story When things get too serious you can just step out of car and take a breath. Have fun!
